lead_paragraph: Hundreds of civilians fled a mountainous region outside the Syrian capital on Sunday, where government forces were battling several insurgent groups, including an al-Qaida-linked outfit excluded from a recent nationwide cease-fire.
snippet: Hundreds of civilians fled a mountainous region outside the Syrian capital on Sunday, where government forces were battling several insurgent groups, including an al-Qaida-linked outfit excluded from a recent nationwide cease-fire....

headline.main: Hundreds Flee Fighting Near Syria's Capital Despite Truce
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Flee Fighting Near Syria's Capital Despite Truce
